title: Minhxx
author: Minhxx
content: Hello to comrades of Bitcoin who are hold and still hold !! First word, I am a native VIETNAMESE.I am a strong believer in Bitcoin and BlockChain. I have the ability to translate, read and understand texts in English- Vietnamese for people who believe in Bitcoin and BlockChain like me, with experience over 10 years learning English, I belive nothing can hard me.The translations include, but are not limited to:- websites.- ANN threads.- ICOs.- white papers.- various articles.- various web content.- just ask, I can do all.Telegram : @Landskye
